Basic Types

Arrow provides typeclass instances for several platform types. These instances are available in the module arrow-instances.

Numbers

  • Show

  • Eq

  • Order

  • Semigroup

  • Monoid

String

  • Show

  • Eq

  • Order

  • Semigroup

  • Monoid

  • FilterIndex

  • Index

Boolean

Note that because Boolean doesn’t have a companion object you’ll find these in BooleanInstances.

  • Show

  • Eq

Char

  • Show

  • Eq

  • Order
